mhrNumber.description: The MHR Number that uniquely identifies the registration.

documentId.description: Unique registration document ID/number assigned by the Manufactured Home Registry.

documentRegistrationNumber.description: The document registration number that uniquely identifies a registration.

username.description: Name of the user who created the registration. Empty string for legacy registrations.

statusType.description: The status of the registration. ACTIVE - registered; DRAFT; EXEMPT; FROZEN; CANCELLED or HISTORICAL - cancelled. FROZEN is a temporary state where only BC Registries staff can make a change to the manufactured home.

path.description: The relative path for a GET request to retrieve an individual registration.

createDateTime.description: Generated by the system, the date and time the registration is created.

clientReferenceId.description: An optional client reference identifier associated with the registration. Provided to facilitate client tracking of MHR activity.

ownerNames.description: The names of one or more of the registration active owners, separated by a comma in the format first middle last.

inUserList.description: True if the base registration is already included in the account registrations list.

lienRegistrationType.description: The Personal Property Registry (PPR) registration type if a lien exists for the MH registration. Change registrations such as transfers may not be allowed if a lien exists.

hasCaution.description: Included for the MHREG registration type. True if a caution on the manufacuted home exists that has not expired and has not been cancelled. Allows for cautions that have been continued or extended.

expireDays.description: Conditionally included for the CAU, CAUC, and CAUE caution document types. The value may be negative, and represents the number of days from the current timestamp before a caution unit note registration expires. For CAUC regisrations that have no expiry date, the unreachable value of -9999 is returned.

frozenDocumentType.description: If the statusType is FROZEN, frozenDocumentType is conditionally included in the response as the document type of the registration that put the home in a frozen or locked state.

cancelledDocumentType.description: Conditionally included with the NCAN document type registration as the document type for the unit note registration that has been cancelled.

cancelledDocumentDescription.description: Conditionally included with the NCAN document type registration as the document type description for the unit note registration that has been cancelled.
